articles.title: Whitehall spending ‘tens of millions’ on Rees-Mogg’s bill to scrap EU laws - The Guardian
articles.description: Opposition MPs call for government rethink on ‘reckless’ plans to rewrite almost 4,000 European regulations
articles.content:
Civil servants are estimated to be spending tens of millions of pounds establishing which laws and regulations could be scrapped under the governments controversial retained EU laws bill.

articles.title: UK agrees to send Challenger 2 tanks to Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Decision ends uncertainty on whether London should supply next-generation tanks to the war-stricken country.
articles.content: The U.K. agreed to send next-generation tanks to Kyiv in a bid to seize on the moment with an acceleration of global military and diplomatic support to Ukraine, Downing Street announced on Saturday.… [+1883 chars]
